verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My soul magnifies the Lord,
And my spirit rejoices in God my Saviour;
My soul magnifies the Lord,
And my spirit rejoices in my God.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice!
Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice!
My soul rejoices in the Lord.
Rejoice, Rejoice, Rejoice!
Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice!
My soul rejoices in the Lord.
